name: Eagle’s brewery
title: This is Eagle's title
subtitle: And this one will be Eagle's subtitle

text.content: A home brewn taste. Eagle’s brewery started from humble beginnings, a taste crafted for friends and trew beer lovers. After trying the beer at a local tasting we developed a unique design that will surely take this brand to new heights. The solution here was to play to brand’s name, ideas and the feeling of the place it took flight from

name: Alfa energy drink
title: This is Alfa title
subtitle: And this one will be Alfa's subtitle

text.content: The client used was just starting out, and as such he didn’t define the brand and the audience in the right way. The initial solution he developed, relied on ‘cannibal marketing’. Taking the elements from brands such as Superman and Red Bull to create something unique.
The problem we faced was that the client wanted his brand to last, to create a new force on the market.
